title: Midnight Pleasure
description: Kara is being haunted by a man in her dreams. A man that looks so powerful that she knows no one in the world could possibly match his grace. Suddenly, when she needs him the most, the man of her dreams takes shape in an extraordinary man called Logan. Without any thought, Logan is offering her everything she ever wanted, but first, she has to fight her body to surviveâ€¦ And only he can save her.
author: Mia Petrova
